english.segment1: Tonight the stars speak of your infinite love. And it serves to remind me. That what I have means nothing at all. Compared to your glory, Oh lord
english.segment2: How long till your voice speaks clearly?. How long till your arms envelope me?. I cry be my strength when I am weak. Oh Lord have mercy on me please
english.segment3: My spirit is willing but my flesh is so weak. I cry in your arms now. God grant me the strength to rest in you. I lift my hands and cry.
